name: HotelBeds Request
description:
1 BaseClient\Request\Pws\Package\PackageGroupRequest

Del resultado copiamos el id
<ProductGroup Name="SPAIN" Id="3667171" StaticId="2147" CountProductsInGroup="263" CountUniqueProductsInGroup="263">

2 requests BaseClient\Request\Pws\Package\PackageGroupRequest

Si queremos afinar a una provincia de espa√±a, con el id anterior lo ponemos en la request y copiamos el nuevo id:
<ProductGroup Name="Majorca/Mallorca" Id="3667464" StaticId="2471" CountProductsInGroup="5" CountUniqueProductsInGroup="5">

3 BaseClient\Request\Pws\Package\PackageProductRequest

Con el id de 1 o de 2 lo pegamos en la request y copiamos HBG_Id del paquete que queramos:
<Offer HBG_Id="efcccc4f-4793-441b-b44e-3351a69a6eb5_0" ProductCode="69995" HotelKey="69995;96528;PMI" LengthOfStay="7" ArrivalDate="2016-12-12" Provider="Hotelbeds" NearestAirportDLC="PMI" Brand="YEJHUK">

4 packagebookingapi/1.0/prebookings


A partir de esta llamada ya es el flujo que conoceis.

requests.name: 8  packagebookingapi/1.0/prebookings/id/setTransfers
7 /packagebookingapi/1.0/prebookings/{preBookingId}/flights/{flightNumber}/seats
requests.description: Retrieves Prebooking summary cheking for availability of sevices in order to allow save and confirm in diferent steps

requests.name: 8  packagebookingapi/1.0/prebookings/id/setTransfers
2 requests BaseClient\Request\Pws\Package\PackageGroupRequest
requests.rawModeData:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<PackageGroupRequest xmlns="http://www.peakwork.net/pws/2010/03" AuthKey="861b343156aabb6109606483a2e9fa54" Lang="en" Currency="GBP" OnRequestBookable="true" TransferIncluded="0" PricesByPax="1" DetailLevel="basic" ShowAsLocalTime="1" ShowAllotment="true" ShowRatings="0" HotelDetail="10" ShowSegments="true" ShowProductCount="true" DirectChildren="true">
  <TravelPeriod DurationAppliance="hotel">
    <DepartureDate>2016-12-26</DepartureDate>
    <ReturnDate>2016-12-29</ReturnDate>
    <Duration>1</Duration>
  </TravelPeriod>
  <Travellers>
    <Adult Age="30" RefId="1"/>
    <Adult Age="30" RefId="2"/>
  </Travellers>
  <Location/>
   <Hotel>
    <HotelAttributeCodeList AttributeOperator="and" FQN="true"/>
    <Recommendations/>
    <Rooms>
      <Room>
        <PersonAssignments>
          <PersonAssignment RefId="1"/>
          <PersonAssignment RefId="2"/>
        </PersonAssignments>
      </Room>
    </Rooms>
    <GlobalTypeList Operator="or" ReturnAs="separate"/>
  </Hotel>
  <Flight/>
   <GroupIdList>3996930</GroupIdList>
</PackageGroupRequest>
